Title: Relates to criminal possession of a flamethrower
Summary: Establishes the crime of criminal possession of a flamethrower as a class E felony.
LawCode: Amd ยง265.00, add ยง265.41, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to adding possession of a flamethrower to the crime of criminal possession of a weapon in the fourth degree
